ROM.Changelog:
## VertexOS Carbide v3.6:
* Now version 3.6 * Fixed Blueborne bluetooth issue * Lastest CAF merges * Removed AutoSMP * Kernel improvements * Nothing more since this is a quick FIX to solve blue borne bluetooth issue so you guys dont suffer :). # Note : Clean flash is always recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated if not clean flashed. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs.
